question: Which sports body has adopted a new visual identity, after it has completed 100 years of participation at the Summer Olympics?
explanation:
The Indian Olympic Association (IOA) has adopted a new institutional and a commercial logo, to celebrate its 100 years of participation of Indian athletes at the Summer Olympics.
The previous institutional logo was adopted during the period of British rule in India and has been used till present. The new branding and visual identity have been approved by the International Olympic Committee.
